website_summaries.verdict: A unique-looking watch that will stand out in a crowd. Offers excellent value for money.
pros: Superior craftsmanship in an affordable watch
Its solid stainless steel construction is hard-wearing and the polyurethane strap is comfortable enough for everyday wear
cons: Some users report the steel buckle needs periodic adjusting as it slips from the band

customer_reviews.title: ~30 days lifespan watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand new watch and after a ~month of use (using it 2-3 times a week) the second hand fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Size: perfect Comfort: excellent Band: I really like it. Rubber very comfortable. Bezel: very attractive
customer_reviews.author: NSB45

customer_reviews.title: Small face but still nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband owns many Invicta time pieces, the majority being pro divers. I wanted to get him one that doesn't resemble what he already owns. I'm a huge Doctor Who fan, and the color sequence reminded me of the TARDIS. Husband would be reminded of me when he wears this.... However be warned that the face of the watch is small, and can be hard to read if you're used to big faces like my husband is.
customer_reviews.author: writer1986

customer_reviews.title: Not too fancy but is exactly what I want
customer_reviews.text: I got this one for my boyfriend on Father's Day. He loves watches so this is the second Invicta watch I get him. I bought is so he can get rid of his work watch, but he likes it too much to wear it for work because it has his favorites colors on it so he use it for non formal places. Looks more sport than anything.
customer_reviews.author: ZSE

customer_reviews.title: Nice stylish watch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch for the price. Opening package, delighted to see a beautiful yellow box. The watch was packed very well with excellent padding, and tissue paper covering the dial face.The watch is stylish, and the colors are vivid. I only made one change. Removed the existing band, replacing it with this: 22mm RIOS1931 for Panatime Cognac Genuine Soft Calf Leather Breitling Style Watch Strap with White Stitching 115/83 22/18, which is sold on Amazon. Color of the band accentuates the watch very nicely. I've received several compliments, and been asked where I got the band. It's a very nice timepiece. If you like it what you see, then go ahead and get one for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Vongar

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: Simple, nice, clean watch. The rubber strap fits snugly but comfortably. Invicta is new for me, some of the reviews were sketchy so it remains to be seen how well it holds up. But it complements my collection of formal-ish, very large face watches that are more for work or a night out. This is more of a casual, wear anywhere watch that still looks nice but could be worn hiking or camping. Looks like great value for the $$ if the reliability is there.
customer_reviews.author: RX Doctor

customer_reviews.title: CALL ME OLD FASHIONED
customer_reviews.text: I AM 65, AND GREW UP USING CLOCKS WITH HANDS. mY GRANDSON, 2 YEARS OLD, BROKE MY OLD WATCH AND I NEEDED A WATCH LIKE THIS. BOUGHT IT ON AMAZON DAY, SO IT WAS DISCOUNTED. KEEPS GOOD TIME SO FAR. I HAVE A LARGE WRIST AND IT COMES WITH A LARGE BAND WHICH IS PERFECT FOR ME. SO MANY OTHERS COME WITH A SMALLER BAND WHICH i HAVE TO REPLACE. jUST HAS THE CLOCK, NO DATE. wHICH IS PERFECT FOR ME. SIMPLE DESIGN , LUV IT SO FAR.
customer_reviews.author: KC Grandpa Tech

customer_reviews.title: Nautica Blue
customer_reviews.text: It may not come in clear but the watch is nautica blue. This one is not as heavy as some of the other Invicta watches which makes it a great casual watch. Very nice watch Invicta.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Happy Couple.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say Invicta watches are the best around and this watch is no exception. I gave it to my husband as an anniversary gift and he loved it. The watch is a beautiful peace and any man would love to have it. "Ladies if you buy this watch for the special man you your life; you will differently score extra loving points with you man!" That is always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Heart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch that is very classy. Very pleased with the watch and the price.
customer_reviews.author: skeeterman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable casual watch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the watch for myself. Very comfortable casual watch. I like the sturdy feel of the components and don't get the feeling that I'll be looking for a replacement band earlier than I should. I may look for other models to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phinfan114

customer_reviews.title: Good Inexpensive Watch
customer_reviews.text: Invecta has long been known for making accurate timepieces and this one is no exception. My problem with this one is the rubber band and no date feature. Also it does not have a screw down stem making it susceptable to leakage.
customer_reviews.author: john d stewart

customer_reviews.title: delvery not good !!
customer_reviews.text: my package was left in the middle of my walk way , and no doorbell was rung! it was not given to a resident anyone could have walked away with my package!! poor delivery 8:00am at night lucky I was home and expecting delivery!
customer_reviews.author: rocketred

customer_reviews.title: Great brand watch
customer_reviews.text: I love purchasing these watches as gifts for the males in my family. They are nice and sturdy and thickly made. The watch is amazing. I love the style and I loveeeee the prices amazin sales them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amber-Ze'Na

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Invicta Black Watch w/Red & White Highlights
customer_reviews.text: This 44 mm model Invicta was the perfect replacement for my 50 mm black Invicta watch that I lost. It's more handsome with the white and red highlights surrounding the blackwatch. At $56 it is competitively priced.
customer_reviews.author: Weathervane & The Cupola Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Loses Time
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the design of the watch! It fits well and looks very good. Unfortunately, it loses time. I found myself having to reset it every few days, which is not what you want in a watch... I called Amazon and unfortunately, I was outside the 30-day return window, so they wouldn't take it back. Looks like I am now stuck with a watch that doesn't do the single job it was built to do. **UPDATE** So I called back and pressed Amazon, and they DID agree to take back the watch and grant a full refund. I guess that's why I do business with them!
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my little brother for his 24th Birthday. I was a little nervous because I didn't know what kind of watch he would like. I just know I wanted to get him something grown, sexy and fun. After receiving it my husband fell in love with it and said that he'd definitely wear it. My brother loves it as well he wears it everyday, he told me he wanted something a little nicer than what he had before which was a G Shock. It looks really good on I think it's the perfect size not too big not too small. I like a man's watch that makes a statement and this surely does.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for price
customer_reviews.text: Used as an everyday work watch it's big (but not too big) It has nice weight to it, but wears comfortably. Time keeping is okay, as it has lost about 1 minute in 6 months. I've worn it in the gym shower w/o problem but haven't fully submerged it as yet. Overall I'm pleased with the style & durability or it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray.B

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Love these watches this is a must have. The color is more navy than royal blue only thing I didnt like. However he loved the watch. Great for a male gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tristina Allen

customer_reviews.title: good quality watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I received an amazon gift card for Christmas and decided to purchase this watch as I have a thing for watches. I know invicta is a reputable brand and the price was to good to pass up. I received the watch in about a week and was satisfied with my purchase. its the size I like and is durable and attractive. I like the silicone strap and the color black and yellow. I will be wearing it daily so I am sure it will stand up to every day wear and tear. I am happy with my purchase and would recommend this watch for anyone who is looking for a good product at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: robert balboni

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my son (17yrs old) as a gift. He absolutely loves it! He wears it daily during moderate to high activity. The only thing he had to get used to was the silicone band, but other that that there have been no complaints. The weight is decent, not too bulky but enough to be aware of it's presence.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sundberg

customer_reviews.title: Of course it doesn’t look expensive like most Invicta watches because it’s a sport
customer_reviews.text: Of course it doesn’t look expensive like most Invicta watches because it’s a sport . If your looking for a daily watch just because of the name or to simply add to your collection this is it . If your looking for the expensive look as the dressy watches are this one isn’t for you .
customer_reviews.author: Muva of a Princess 16

customer_reviews.title: It keeps fine time and looks good
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be a quality watch. It keeps fine time and looks good. It has Japan movement on the back so I don't think it's Swiss made or has Swiss movement which is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cab.

customer_reviews.title: A great watch
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this watch for about week, but it is great. It is slightly bigger than I was anticipating, but I am perfectly fine with that. It seems to be very solidly built and looks like it will stand up to daily use. The wristband is a little stiff at first, but after a few days of wear it will relax a bit. It also came in a very nice box. I have already had several compliments on it. Overall a great product, and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Market

customer_reviews.title: No frills Invicta watch.
customer_reviews.text: One of the budget friendly Invicta watch lines. It simply tells time, and is accurate. The biggest obstacle is wearing a rubber wristband. If you like a sightly bigger watch than what usual vendors sell, and don't mind a rubber wristband, I'd say it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: SonnyK

customer_reviews.title: ECONOMY MODEL INVICTA WATCH !
customer_reviews.text: This is a "low end" model Invicta watch. It looks cool from a distance but "up close" you can tell it's a "cheaper series" watch. The internal movement has the "feel" of a 20.00 watch. I've seen this model sell for between 35 - 50.00. My advice: Get the Invicta models priced between 75 - 125.00 or more. They are usually a much higher quality watch with a great "feel and look" factor. Most Invicta watches are "hard to beat" ! Thanks, Dale.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Fryberger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loves it ! It cane just in time for his birthday,, fast delivery also
customer_reviews.author: Yvette T Thurston

customer_reviews.title: ... years ago and my friend still talk about how nice is it and how he still get compliments
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present about 3 years ago and my friend still talk about how nice is it and how he still get compliments
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Loses time intermittently.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Looks great, but after a few months it started periodically losing time. As an example, one day last week it was spot on in the morning and I walked into a meeting late because the watch suddenly lost 10 minutes at some point. Warranty is useless, I have to pay $25 for S&H for a $40 watch that may or may not fail over the two week period they "observe" it. It's a shame, I'll have to throw it out, what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K

customer_reviews.title: Happy...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and excellent quality.... My daughter introduced me to Invicta watches and loved the product since!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for daily wear
customer_reviews.text: High Quality. Comfortable Weight. Not as large as many Invicta watches, which makes it a perfect watch to wear to work daily
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bezick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, masculine, yet dressy and sporty at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and weight of this watch. May be too large for a small wrist. Color combination is easy to read. I bought this at a sale price and received free shipping.....what a great deal! At these prices I decided to buy a watch just to have a "fashion" change. The band is sturdy and attractive. This makes a beautiful gift for anyone, great packaging. Invicta has other color combos, check them out. Check the dimensions, make sure you want a watch of this size.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price. Looks and fills great on my wrist. Looks like a more expensive watch.
customer_reviews.author: dredog

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat eye catching.
customer_reviews.text: One of the budget friendly Invicta watch lines. It simply tells time, and is accurate. The biggest obstacle is wearing a rubber wristband. If you like a sightly bigger watch than what usual vendors sell, and don't mind a rubber wristband, I'd say it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: SonnyK

customer_reviews.title: Nice pic
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for something reasonable with the price and good looking for casual outfits as i always prefer casual over formals it’s the right choice , but it won’t be looking good for formals.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Khalil

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice watch, the band is a little stiff but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch, the band is a little stiff but I believe with some wear it will lossen, up over time. I have several other Invicta watches. Also this watch is not large, like some of my other invicta. It looks very expensive in spite of what I pay for the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jackosn

customer_reviews.title: Got it on sale, no regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during the Amazon Prime Day sale and my husband absolutely loves it. I wouldn't pay full price for it (just because I'm cheap at times), but it really is a beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.author: Armani Beck-McField

customer_reviews.title: Invicta are nice watches
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great for any time. Looks great with many different styles whether its a wedding or just daily wear. Quality is good. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A&E Gallery

customer_reviews.title: As usual he loved the watch
customer_reviews.text: As usual he loved the watch. I had to get something for my husband that he could wear everyday cause he's wearing his good Invicta watches out.
customer_reviews.author: Kikigreen

customer_reviews.title: NOT ACCURATE TIME - DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Straight from the package right into issues. Set the correct time and the minute arrow either skips ahead 5 minutes or goes back 15 minutes randomly throughout the day. Then like magic goes back to telling accurate time. The fact it is a watch and cannot accurate time makes it a pretty useless acesseory therefore 1/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Andriy Malish

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a not too casual look. Love Invicta watches. This is the second Invicta watch I have purchased from Amazon. I get quite a few complements on both watches.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie's dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Bday present for family member. Nice color but a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Sinn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Watch stopped working after a few days. Don’t purchase! Don’ttttttt do it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: I own several Invictas and this is one of my favorites. The look is amazing and it is extremely comfortable. Great deal on a quality watch.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Invicta Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch nice color. This is going to be a Christmas gift for my friend who like me collects watches. Amazon was great! UPS said they delivered the package and left it at my door, but we never got it. I contacted Amazon and they immediately shipped me out another replacement watch. However, UPS came the next day with all the packages I was expecting. I will continue to use Amazon and highly recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: W. Whittenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Got this for an after Christmas sale price of $39.00!!! Got a $25 Amazon Gift Card, so my cost was tiny. Very nice watch, very sturdy, even heavy, compared to the usual Timex digitals I buy for my self. I don't spend a lot on watches because I seem to beat them up, but this thing seems like it will be indestructible. So I'm getting use to the weight right now, and looking forward to seeing how it holds up through summer activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Feels cheaply made and didnt last very long. Probably okay for the price if you get it cheap
customer_reviews.author: undrgrndkng

customer_reviews.title: very thick case, otherwise decent watch
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly petite wrists so the one complaint I have is the case is a bit thick, and at first feels like a "two story" watch, but after wearing it a few times, I have gotten used to it, and it is not a bad looking watch for 50 dollars, I do match my watches to my outfits, so the one thing I can say is I don't think I would want it as my only watch, but as a compliment to a red shirt it is great
customer_reviews.author: geoff strom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my hubby
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch aaa an Anniversary gift for my husband. It’s the ONLY type of watch he will wear. He LOVES IT! He has had it on his wrist everyday since I gave it to him!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son likes it. I think it looks nice. He’s very active so it’s not his everyday watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tana

customer_reviews.title: I want another one
customer_reviews.text: I love the equality and feel of this watch! Not too heavy and not too light but we'll balance. The blue and gold banquet out such a luxury feel to it
customer_reviews.author: Akeem

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time on Invicta
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch and also the 12846 Specialty Black Dial Watch with yellow/black bezel. Six months later the stem broke on the 1286. Having multiple watches, I wore other watches but decided to call Invicta on repair instructions. Having thought there was a longer warranty time it turns out from customer service that I have to send $28 handling fee and according to web site $30 repair fee. I take the hit for the late attention to check the warranty but I won't take the hit for the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: My Father in law liked mine so much that I surprised him and ordered him one as far as I know he hasn't taken it off.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.Davis

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I like Most Invicta Watches, but this is a Very, Very cheap looking timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Thuron Gordon

customer_reviews.title: There are better watches out there.
customer_reviews.text: For the $50...there are far better out there! Invicta have to speeds of watches...really good and or NOT! This is the latter! The "Specialty" is that it can't be used for diving, wouldn't suggest swimming with it either! The strap, though rubber looking is plastic. The bezel is decorative only.
customer_reviews.author: LITTLESTHOBOUK

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Father’s Day gift it was perfect it’s looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Mamilalopez

customer_reviews.title: The picture on Amazon must've been taken in direct sunlight because these watch colors are quite dull. If I had to do it all ove
customer_reviews.text: Meh. The picture on Amazon must've been taken in direct sunlight because these watch colors are quite dull. If I had to do it all over again, I would have purchased something else. I've had this watch on my wrist for twenty minutes and it's kept good time, so at least it does the most important thing accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Invicta 12846
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Colors are bright and makes the watch pop. As a watch collector I really like the Invicta watch line which range from the less expensive watch to the high end watch line. I would highly recommend this or any other Invicta watch. I would also highly recommend Amazon for the place to make any purchase. Their prices are reasonable and they stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: W. Whittenberger

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks nice and has a great band which is comfortable and fits well. The color is unique and overall it is a nice size and weight. On the downside, however, the dial/numbers and hands are not glow-in-the-dark so you can not tell time in low-light situations. Also - the bezel does NOT turn; so it actually serves no purpose other than decorative since you cannot use it as a timer. Overall, my husband was not impressed - and the sale price was the only thing that kept it from being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Black

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for a friend on Father’s Day and loves it
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love Invicta watches!
customer_reviews.text: I started collecting and wearing Invicta watches since I bought one for my son. I was impressed with the workmanship and the design. I will keep adding whether the one I like is for women or men. I love the big dial and ease of reading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work!
customer_reviews.text: I order this watch and it doesn't work. I ordered it earlier for a gift for my son and straight put the box it doesn't even function as a watch just a peice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my husband for Christmas to replace a still perfectly working but let’s say... “well-worn” Kenneth Cole watch. He LOVED it! The watch looks exactly like what’s pictured, has a nice weight to it and seems like it will stand up to the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanda R.

customer_reviews.title: My latest Invicta
customer_reviews.text: I have several Invicta watches...love them. This model is very stylish...fits well...good value.
customer_reviews.author: David J Burdick

customer_reviews.title: A $ 40 Gem of a Watch
customer_reviews.text: For $ 40 you can not go wrong with this watch. For me this is a clean design and the blue, gold and stainless steel compliment each other well. The embossed lettering on the strap is unobtrusive enough to not be easily noticed. It's not like it screams out. Keeps good time so far, nice balance of size and weight for my wrist. Have not encountered any of the issues that the few negative reviews have.
customer_reviews.author: DramaGuy

customer_reviews.title: He really liked it. I like the rubber watch band because ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother. He really liked it. I like the rubber watch band because it makes it great for everyday use. I would have given it five stars, but although I like the band I wish the rubber was a little more flexible. The price of this watch makes it a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Gatsbygirl

customer_reviews.title: Invicta Men's 12845 watch
customer_reviews.text: It's rugged, it's handsome, it works and it's only a couple twenties more than shop lifting!!! I own a Rolex and when I ride my bike it stays home, this is the watch to wear when when you might take a tumble or two. Classic good looks, the strap is great for any sport from the ocean to the mountains. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kayaking Don

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch, well crafted.
customer_reviews.text: Don't judge this watch by the provided pictures, its much nicer in person. I was actually surprised when first seeing it how flashy and well matched the different aspects of this watch are. The band is a firm black rubber and the buckle is a silver-toned brushed aluminum styled steel and all both match and compliment the deep red on the face perfectly. This a really nice watch and I definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a great casual addition to their collection.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, worth more than it costs
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, fits perfectly, looks great and its not built cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ay yi yi
customer_reviews.text: Dropped once, seconds hand fell off. Minute hand stops periodically. When trying to adjust to correct time, does not always work. DON'T BUY!...
customer_reviews.author: joseph gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size and looks really good in my watch collection.
customer_reviews.author: JD Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is a large watch for large-wristed people
customer_reviews.text: This is a large watch for large-wristed people. Small-wristed people should stay away. I have many Invictas and I really like them. This is the second one I have purchased with a black rubber band. I really like them for biking and swimming. They are very tough and perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M.

customer_reviews.title: casual at its best
customer_reviews.text: i use this watch mostly on the weekend and get many compliments, love the strap it is good, i wash my hands constanlty because the line work i am in and strap does not crack or brittle.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only usedit like 10 times and already stop working. Not a great watch it is beautiful But cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am an Invicta addict and collect a lot of their watches ; this one has a cool look, casual time piece for a relaxed look. of course, like an Invicta, It keeps time, is always a good piece for conversation and often noticed by your friends and co-workers.It is light to wear, not as bulky as some of the Invicta watches and a smaller wrist can wear it without being too heavy or ackward.
customer_reviews.author: PatriZio M. Busnel

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. He wears it all the time and it look very nice on him. It’s perfect for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carson

customer_reviews.title: Men’s Invicta
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted an Invicta watch and this one didn’t disappoint. It’s a beautiful watch, and for the price can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Catalino Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: My husband bought this watch in addition to the Invicta ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this watch in addition to the Invicta Men's Pro Diver 8936, 23K gold-plated watch. He wears this watch to work everyday; model 8936 is for weekends and dressier occasions. Many thanks to the seller for a superb product.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: Great invicta style.
customer_reviews.text: Love invicta quality. This watch is very comfortable. Easy to read. Band is soft.
customer_reviews.author: LReid

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this watch as a birthday present for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch as a birthday present for my son. It was defective when it arrived. I returned the watch for a replacement. When the second watch arrived, it was also defective. It also has been returned. Disappointing birthday for me and my son.
customer_reviews.author: Robert White

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch.
customer_reviews.text: Compliments left & right! Looks sporty and formal at the same time! Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Watch
customer_reviews.text: I recently started buying Invicta watches and I have yet to be disappointed with any of them. This is one of my favorites as it's not as big as a couple of the others I have and it's quite versatile. I would love to have it with a blue trim.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my better half. He loves it. Great casual watch.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Solid watch. Looks good. No other functionality than time. The strap is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Striking looks but you need a big wrist
customer_reviews.text: This is not for people with smallish wrists. The band is not as flexible as I would like, and it is hard to create a snug fit with my wrist size. Looks great though, at least when it's on top of my wrist and not down the edge.
customer_reviews.author: chairbarry

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: A very simple watch that gets the job done. It is attractive for that reason. That and the ""yellow" band around the face. I'm seeing it more as a wear while you work watch than anything else. The rubber band is exactly that (no scratches). Not the sharpest tool in the shed but a "Very OK" timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Beth

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice and manly
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a gift. It is a very nice and manly watch
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my dad. Love the unique colors and nautical look this watch has. My dad wears it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amber Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVING IT.
customer_reviews.text: Invicta, I love these watches, I went a little overkill this past Christmas and I bought too many to handle. So I had to return some. But every male I know got a watch. Great price, great company, strong product. VERY GOOD BUY. THIS WATCH IS SO NICE!
customer_reviews.author: LCA

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool watch
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this watch for about a week and I really like it. Bought it for work, needed something I could sweat in and beat up and not feel guilty about it. Very impressed when I unboxed it, its bigger than it seems in the picture, and the red is really nice. The band is very sturdy feeling and also comfortable. I'm very pleased with this watch so far, and it seems like itl last a long time. This was my first invicta but I don't think ito be the last, I highly recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R.

customer_reviews.title: Stiff band
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived has promised and I must add, it's a smart looking time piece. The problem I have with it is the band. It's rather stiff and feels somewhat fragile to the watch. First watch I've ever owned with such a band. I hope with time it gathers some flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Bdarwin

customer_reviews.title: Invicta men's 12845
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the invicta watches, the fact that this particular watch comes in different colors is very helpful since my husband matches his shoes with his watches or hats. I bought this watch for his birthday and he loved it. The watch got here on time. Overall this is a very good product. Can't go wrong with an invicta watch<< that's what my husband says.
customer_reviews.author: Quinmar

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: But just too big for me. I just didn't realize how thick the watchband was based on the picture. If you are looking for a hefty watch this would work for you
customer_reviews.author: Maria3133

customer_reviews.title: Quality Piece of Crap
customer_reviews.text: I got it and it did not work straight out the box. I got it replaced and the replacement was worse. It looked like someone was playing with it at the warehouse and didn't put it back in the case properly and it still did not work. It would be nice if yall made sure products were in good working condition before they are sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I like to watch, for the money I paid you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: richard colon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color, the durability ....its an amazing watch
customer_reviews.author: Shinika

customer_reviews.title: The watch is sturdy enough for every day use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend, who is not a flashy type. The watch is sturdy enough for every day use, and very attractive but not too flashy to wear casually. It fits perfectly, and doesn't slide around on his wrist. The colors are true to the photo and band details really complement the face.
customer_reviews.author: H Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Love my new baby
customer_reviews.text: Niceeeeeee piece, and for 42 bucks wow stop complaining people are you sick, this watch is beautiful and the wrist band is a little hard but it's just like a new pair of jeans, you have to break them in,
customer_reviews.author: BIG VIC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this watch. Invicta never dissapoints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye Catching
customer_reviews.text: This Invicta watch is a good-looking item. I wear it casually or when I"m biking. It is a bit on the big side, but still good. I am surprised at its original retail price (about $450) but found it easier to swallow at the Amazon sale price (during 50%off sale) of $45..no complaints. Time will tell how it holds up, but so far -so good after a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Billy C
